content: this cozy cowl is a fun fast knit the simple texture shows off hand-dyed yarns nicely and the is easy enough to take with you to knit night i designed this while visiting scotland for the edinburgh yarn festival it was perfect for keeping the chilly damp of scotland in march at bay pattern includes directions for a one skein cowl and a two skein infinity scarf you can check out the companion pattern which uses a bulky yarn here link text 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/royal-mile-cowl
